summary: Hi all, this mod, add a new big Nocturnal Plan of Oblivion (or something like this). The castle, with extended boundaries,shadow forest,battlefield,lake of shadow,castle itself and its rooms like chapel ,bar,lounge.
descriptionHtml:
Version : 2.4
Date : 02/01/14
Category : Location -interier-Armor-weapons-companion.
Author(s) : DanteZaf
[IMG]http://s019.radikal.ru/i633/1401/11/60dfc57a496b.jpg[/IMG]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=10][b]Dark Blue[/b][/size]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Description:
-------------------------
Hi guys, so in the main -This Location will be aviable only then main thieft giuld quest is complete, yeap - skeleton key to Nocturnal..

because it too simple just walk there, and stupid.

So now in version 2.4 this mod part of the "Twilight sepulcer"
entrance look like LORE description, and more "VOID" look like..

So with this, mod look like a extension to the game borders,and this really are.
You can pass to Nocturnal plane,and exam new sub location (9)


So what is all about?
Then you complete quest of thiefs guild and look at the portal Ebonmere, d oyou wanna go to there? To nocturnal plane, and explore it?
So now this can happens, ill tried create a dangerous place with unique style and beatifully dark look. For LORE descriptions.
THis place have dangereous unpredictble artifact,(DONT USE a shadow ring its really turn you into ghost) bit i like it personaly, weapons powerfull but work is two ways,and might to kill you. + some times all this does not work. (ill create it ,but wtf ? o.o it too strange)
And have 8 sub location,with not fully 100% lore, (but i can do only LORE version without fanny moment and other things)

so its not complete yet,and more work to be done ,quest, reward, dialogue, heroes from elder scrolls 2,and animation (hard)

Location:
----------------------
In Twilight Sepulsher Nocturnal cave after the main mission, 3 gate in front of Ebonmere portal.


---Installation:---
--------------------------------
Manual Installation:
---------------------------------
1. Extract the files from the archive.
2. Copy files to C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonSkyrimData
3. Start Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', place a checkmark beside the .esp file.




2.4
-too many visual changes compare to older version, add effect, fix the visual bugs etc.
-work on sub location (main hall overdisened =) )
work on progress..

---------------------
This mod required (OR CTD! )

-Skyrim.esm (HI cap!)
-Update.esm
-Dawnguard.esm
-RaceCompatibilitiy.esm

Enjoy,and if you like this mod,so comment it,or may be give idea,thanks for you attention.
author: DragonZaf
